O

onClientConnected(ServerClient) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Server
This method is triggered automatically when the client has successfully connected to the server.
onClientDisconnected(ServerClient) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Server
This method is triggered automatically when the client has disconnected from the server.
onConnected(String, int) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Client
This method is triggered automatically when the client has successfully connected to a server via the connect(String, int) method.
onConnected() - Method in class sanavesa.net.ServerClient
This method is triggered automatically when the client has successfully connected to the server.
onDisconnected() - Method in class sanavesa.net.ServerClient
This method is triggered automatically when the client has successfully disconnected from the server.
onDisconnectedLocally(String, int) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Client
This method is triggered automatically when the client has requested to disconnect from a server via the disconnect() method.
onDisconnectedRemotely(String, int) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Client
This method is triggered automatically when the client has been disconnected from the server.
onFailedToConnect(String, int) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Client
This method is triggered automatically when the client has failed to connect to a server via the connect(String, int) method.
onReceivedData(T) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Client
This method is triggered automatically when the client has received data from the server.
onReceivedData(T, ServerClient) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Server
This method is triggered automatically when the server has received data from any client.
onReceivedData(T) - Method in class sanavesa.net.ServerClient
This method is triggered automatically when the server has received data from this client.
onServerFailedToStart(int) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Server
This method is triggered automatically when the server has failed to start running Server.startServer(int) method.
onServerStarted(int) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Server
This method is triggered automatically when the server has successfully started running via the Server.startServer(int) method.
onServerStopped(int) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Server
This method is triggered automatically when the server has stopped running via the Server.stopServer() method.
outputWriter - Variable in class sanavesa.net.NetworkCommunication
The output stream of the connection.
